item.title: Urban combat training / Entraînement en zone urbaine
item.description:
Urban combat training / Entraînement en zone urbaine

Members of Operation REASSURANCE Land Task Force, Rotation 5, the Polish 25th Air Cavalry Brigade and 7th Coastal Defence Brigade take part in urban combat training, in the Drawsko Pomorskie Training Area, Poland on March 4 and 11, 2016.

item.title: Sailors Engage Small Boat With .50 Caliber Machine Gun
item.description:
Sailors Engage Small Boat With .50 Caliber Machine Gun

Sailors aboard Arleigh Burke-class destroyer USS Momsen (DDG 92) destroy an abandoned lifeboat while underway in the Pacific. AiirSource Military covers events and missions from the United States Armed Forces: Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard. Visit our channel for more military videos: http://www.youtube.com/AiirSource Like & share this video to show your support!

item.title: DARPA's "Sea Hunter" Submarine-Hunting Drone Warship ACTUV
item.description:
DARPA's "Sea Hunter" Submarine-Hunting Drone Warship ACTUV

The Anti-Submarine Warfare (ASW) Continuous Trail Unmanned Vessel (ACTUV) is an anti-submarine drone from DARPA. The ACTUV is aimed at improving the ability to detect and engage diesel-electric submarines, which are inexpensive and quieter in comparison to nuclear-powered submarines, and to negate the threat of adversaries building large numbers by creating anti-submarine tactics at one-tenth the cost of building a diesel submarine.

item.title: Female Leadership - CDR Cyndi Schwartz & LTJG April Amos, Perioperative Nurses
item.description:
Female Leadership - CDR Cyndi Schwartz & LTJG April Amos, Perioperative Nurses

Perioperative Nurses in the Navy Reserve have the opportunity to perform part-time service with full-time impact. CDR Cyndi Schwartz ands LTJG April Amos are both examples of those who joined the Navy to make a difference not only in their lives, but in the lives of others, here and around the world.

item.title: MSAU| Marine Security Guard Security Augmentation Unit
item.description:
MSAU| Marine Security Guard Security Augmentation Unit

The Marine Security Guard Security Augmentation Unit came into existence after the attacks on U.S. diplomatic facilities in Benghazi, Libya. MSAU's Primary Mission is to provide random and periodic augmentation to MSG Detachments during pre-crises and periods of increased threat. (U.S. Marine Corps video by Sgt. Larry Babilya, Cpl.

item.title: Insane Navy Seals Jump Inside a Stadium With Tens of Thousands of Spectators
item.description:
Insane Navy Seals Jump Inside a Stadium With Tens of Thousands of Spectators

Members of the U.S. Navy Parachute Team, the Leap Frogs, jump into Neyland Stadium. Video Also Include Footage of Blue Angel Team flying in formation over the 2016 Super Bowl at Levi's Stadium.

item.title: Earthquake Relief, Military Child of the Year, and GTCC use update (The Corps Report Ep. 74)
item.description:
Earthquake Relief, Military Child of the Year, and GTCC use update (The Corps Report Ep. 74)

Here's all you need to know about the Corps' latest news. This week's headlines include earthquake relief efforts from the 31st MEU and VMM-265, Christian Fagala, Military Child of the Year, and an update about moving expenses and Government Travel Charge Card use.

item.title: CAF Stories: SkyHawks celebrate 45 years of entertaining Canadians
item.description:
CAF Stories: SkyHawks celebrate 45 years of entertaining Canadians

Captain Jake Porter used to be afraid of heights. Now he paints the sky maple leaf red performing daring aerial acrobatics for the SkyHawks. Everyone has a story. We want to hear yours. Tell us using #MyCAFStory or write to mycafstory-monrecitfac@forces.gc.ca

item.title: CMC SAPR Retaliation Message to Marines
item.description:
CMC SAPR Retaliation Message to Marines

Know your part. Do your part. Every Marine is a leader, and leaders have a responsibility to stop and prevent retaliation. We must keep the faith of those we lead and serve with.

item.title: U.S. Air Force A-10s Landing At Clark Air Base, Philippines (2016)
item.description:
U.S. Air Force A-10s Landing At Clark Air Base, Philippines (2016)

U.S. Air Force A-10C Thunderbolt II aircraft returning from a mission in the vicinity of Scarborough Shoal, Clark Air Base, Philippines. AiirSource Military covers events and missions from the United States Armed Forces: Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Coast Guard.
